article_title: Information from Virginia criminal investigations largely exempt from FOIA
article_text:
German P Culver Jr CPA PC

German P. Culver, Jr., CPA, PC is a Culpeper CPA Firm specializing in accounting services for small businesses and tax services for both individuals and business owners. As a local Culpeper CPA firm, we have helped many local businesses with small business accounting services including outsourced accounting and bookkeeping, tax preparation and planning, new business advisement, IRS help and more.We work hard to provide our clients with reliable accounting services and understand that each business and individual has different financial & accounting needs. We take the time to get to know you and your business so that we can build a long-lasting professional relationship for years to come. Free initial consultation to enable you to get to know us and discuss the needs of your business.

og.description: At the request of the governor and prosecutors, the Virginia State Police are investigating the arrest of University of Virginia student Martese Johnson by Alcoholic Beverage Control agents, but it’s unlikely the public will have access to much of the investigation.
og.title: Information from Virginia criminal investigations largely exempt from FOIA

article_metadata.description: At the request of the governor and prosecutors, the Virginia State Police are investigating the arrest of University of Virginia student Martese Johnson by Alcoholic Beverage Control agents, but it’s unlikely the public will have access to much of the investigation.
